Branch Protection:
-----------------
Not needed initially - workflows will commit to main branch

Secrets to Add (Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions):
-----------------------------------------------------------
Required for News Collection:
- PAT_TOKEN (GitHub Personal Access Token)
- COMMITTER_NAME (Your name)
- COMMITTER_EMAIL (Your email)

Optional for Twitter Bot:
- TWITTER_API_KEY
- TWITTER_API_SECRET
- TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN
- TWITTER_ACCESS_SECRET
- TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN
- OPENAI_API_KEY (or DEEPL_API_KEY or GOOGLE_TRANSLATE_API_KEY)
- TRANSLATION_SERVICE (openai/deepl/google)

After First Push:
----------------
1. Go to Actions tab
2. Enable workflows
3. Run "Daily Blockchain News Collection" manually to test
4. Check contribution graph after first successful run

Security Notes:
--------------
✅ config.json is in .gitignore (never commit API keys)
✅ All sensitive data uses GitHub Secrets
✅ Workflows use minimal required permissions
✅ No hardcoded credentials in code
